appetizers.name: Spring Dosa
appetizers.description: Rice and lentil batter crepes stuffed with vegetables, tempered with curry leaves and mustard seeds. Served with sambhar (lentil broth) and coconut chutney.

appetizers.name: Chicken Mumtaz
appetizers.description: Chicken tenders, spices, chickpea flour, and carom seeds, grilled to perfection.

appetizers.name: Lentil Soup
appetizers.description: Yellow lentil soup with a touch of garlic

entrees.name: Punjabi Kadi Pakora
entrees.description: Fresh yogurt, chickpea flour, light spices, with vegetable fritters.

entrees.name: Chicken Chettinad
entrees.description: Chicken cubes cooked in a special south Indian blend curry, finished with a touch of coconut milk.

entrees.name: Lamb and Turnip
entrees.description: Lamb cubes cookied in a light curry sauce with fresh turnips.

entrees.name: Tandoori Shrimp
entrees.description: Shrimps marinated in yogurt and spices, cooked in the tandoor oven and served on a sizzler.

entrees.name: Tandoori Salmon Tikka
entrees.description: Fresh Chilean salmon fillets lightly marinated and cooked to perfection in the tandoor oven.
